name: 3-Foot Straight Putts
description: Make putts from 3 feet on a straight line

name: 6-Foot Circle Drill
description: Putt from 6 different positions around a 6-foot circle

name: Distance Control - 10ft
description: Focus on distance control to get within 3 feet of hole

name: Lag Putting Practice
description: 30+ foot putts focusing on getting within 3 feet

name: Chip to 3-Foot Circle
description: Chip balls to land within 3 feet of pin

name: Up and Down Challenge
description: Chip and then putt for par from around the green

name: Different Lie Practice
description: Practice chipping from various lies (rough, tight, uphill, downhill)

name: 50-Yard Precision
description: Hit pitch shots to within 10 feet of target from 50 yards

name: High Soft Landing
description: Hit high pitch shots that land softly near pin

name: Distance Control Ladder
description: Hit pitch shots to 30, 40, 50, 60, 70 yard targets

name: 7-Iron Target Practice
description: Hit 7-iron shots to specific yardage targets

name: Ball-First Contact
description: Focus on hitting ball before ground with irons

name: Different Iron Distances
description: Practice with 6, 7, 8, 9 irons to their target distances

name: Fairway Accuracy
description: Hit driver shots that land in fairway

name: Distance Control
description: Focus on consistent distance with driver swings

name: Shot Shaping Practice
description: Practice draws and fades with driver

name: Power Drive Session
description: Focus on maximum distance and power with driver

name: Putting Routine Work
description: Practice your pre-putt routine and setup

name: Tempo & Rhythm Training
description: Work on consistent swing tempo with various clubs

name: Balance & Setup Drills
description: Practice proper stance and balance throughout swing

name: Visualization Practice
description: Mental practice - visualize successful shots before hitting

name: Greenside Setup Work
description: Practice proper setup and stance for various greenside shots
